rules_text:
This spell costs {2} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Choose one or more –
• Counter target activated or triggered ability from a nonland source.
• Vivien’s Endeavor deals 6 damage to target creature with flying.
• Target player searches their library for a creature card with colossal, reach, trample, or vigilance, reveals it, puts it into their hand, then shuffles.
